criteria: Identifies and articulates potential risks and consequences.
Applies communication strategies to navigate risky situations effectively.
descriptions: No attempt to communicate respectfully; communication is unclear or inappropriate.
Communication is sometimes unclear or disrespectful.
Communication is generally clear but may lack respect or sensitivity.
Communication is clear and generally respectful, considering the audience.
Communication is consistently clear, respectful, and tailored to the situation.
Communication is exceptionally clear, respectful, and effectively prevents or avoids risky situations through thoughtful articulation.
Fails to identify potential risks or consequences.
Identifies very few potential risks or consequences.
Identifies some risks and consequences, but lacks detail.
Identifies most risks and consequences relevant to the situation.
Clearly identifies and articulates potential risks and consequences with considerable detail.
Thoroughly and insightfully identifies and articulates potential risks and consequences, demonstrating a deep understanding of the situation.
Does not attempt to apply communication strategies.
Attempts to use strategies, but they are inappropriate or ineffective.
Uses basic strategies with limited effectiveness.
Applies appropriate communication strategies to navigate the situation with some success.
Effectively applies a range of communication strategies to navigate the risky situation.
Masterfully applies a variety of communication strategies to expertly navigate the risky situation, demonstrating adaptability and problem-solving skills.
